name: The Last Tank: Zombie Defense
description:
On the way back from the battlefield, the tank ran out of fuel…!
Take down incoming zombies with the immobile tank!
Currencies pile up even when you are away! Create your own invincible tank using currencies from the zombie hunting!

Inquiry: lasttank@cupstack.net
Terms of service: http://cupstack.net/en/terms-of-service/
Privacy policy: http://cupstack.net/en/privacy-policy/
